revision.comment: Created page with "==English== ===Etymology=== {{suffix|en|Yemen|ization}} ===Noun=== {{en-noun|-}} # the act or process of making [[Yemeni]] #* '''1989''', United States. Congress. House. Co..."
revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== {{suffix|en|Yemen|ization}} ===Noun=== {{en-noun|-}} # the act or process of making [[Yemeni]] #* '''1989''', United States. Congress. House. Committee on Appropriations. Subcommittee on Foreign Operations, Export Financing, and Related Programs, ''Foreign Operations, Export Financing, and Related Programs Appropriations for 1990: Hearings Before a Subcommittee of the Committee on Appropriations, House of Representatives, One Hundred First Congress, First Session'' #*: Another Important part of this program Is the '''Yemenization''' and Increased efficiency of basic education; this program alms at Improving institutions for teacher training and at making qualitative improvements in the primary school system #* '''1989''', ''Yemen Arab Republic: Development Needs of the Education Sector'' #*: With the exception of two secondary science textbooks on which work is progressing, the process of '''Yemenization''' of school textbooks that began twenty years ago has been completed. #* '''2001''', Institute of Petroleum, World Petroleum Congress, ''Actes Et Documents'' ({{ISBN|9780852932971}}) #*: CanadianOxy's '''Yemenization''' program at Masila is another example of an ongoing initiative that has helped solidify positive relations between the Company and its govemment and community partners.
